Package mudServer

Class Summary
GameServer The GameServer accepts new connections from ServerMain and logs them into the game.
Login Verify a connected user's name and password.
Path Paths connect rooms together and allow players to move between rooms.
Room Each room holds players, mobiles, items, and paths to other rooms.
ServerMain On startup, ServerMain will create new socket pairs and the GameServer.
World The World will hold all the rooms that make up the world.
